comments.body: why not just the keys themselves as strings and then remove the interface? I don't think it's used anywhere

It is used to extend the queryable properties for `MediaQueryAllQueryable`, so can be applied to component props and to the standalone `toQuery` helper params

Allows for `<MediaQuery screen={true} handheld={true}>Some handheld device content</MediaQuery>` and `toQuery({screen: true})`

This separation of interfaces mimics how various props are earmarked for inclusion/exclusion to certain operations in the lib, so should be easier to apply correctly and maintain - https://github.com/contra/react-responsive/blob/master/src/mediaQuery.js#L84
